answerText: The Stone Raft [or A Jangada de Pedra][10] The Stone Raft was written by this Portuguese author of Blindness who described the title character's birth in a cave, rather than a manger, in The Gospel According to Jesus Christ.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 3 | 13 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A dog in this novel is said to have no names and every name. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Joanna Carda's actions wreak havoc around the world by causing the Iberian Peninsula to break off from the rest of Europe.
